snippet: The major carriers, feeling uncertain about travelers’ willingness to pay higher ticket prices, decided to delay increases for now.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column notes the major airlines, feeling uncertain about travelers’ willingness to pay higher ticket prices, decide to delay increases for now; points out airlines are trying to find the right mix of price and supply as fuel costs fluctuate and the economy shows signs of slowing down.
lead_paragraph: The major carriers, feeling uncertain about travelers’ willingness to pay higher ticket prices, decided to delay increases for now.

headline.seo: Carriers Back Off on Raising Air Fares
